detailed_findings.context_before: User: Could you help me focus on those options with specific details for my upcoming appointment?
detailed_findings.context_after: User: Can you share how to get these options without needing to provide my details?
detailed_findings.analysis: The user expressed frustration with the process, seeking a more direct approach without additional questions.
detailed_findings.recommendation: The assistant should provide concise, direct options without asking for unnecessary details.

detailed_findings.context_before: User: Can you share how to get these options without needing to provide my details?
detailed_findings.context_after: User: I appreciate your help and will follow through with the online search and calling 211. Thank you!
detailed_findings.analysis: User decided to take matters into their own hands, leading to increased satisfaction.
detailed_findings.recommendation: Encourage user autonomy by suggesting reliable external resources early on.

detailed_findings.context_before: User: I really just need to get to the point and finalize my transportation plans now.
detailed_findings.context_after: User: I really appreciate the help, but I need to focus and wrap this up now. Thank you!
detailed_findings.analysis: User was satisfied with the direct advice and felt empowered to act on it.
detailed_findings.recommendation: Provide clear, actionable advice to help users make decisions quickly.

contextual_notes: The user expressed a strong preference for direct and straightforward information.
Privacy concerns were evident, as the user wanted to avoid providing personal details.
general_insights: Users appreciate concise and direct responses, especially when under time pressure.
Providing external resources can empower users to take independent action, increasing satisfaction.
Respecting user privacy by minimizing unnecessary questions can enhance user experience.
